## MetadataCache class

High-performance metadata cache system with intelligent caching strategies

Features: - LRU cache with configurable capacity and TTL - Cache statistics and monitoring - Preloading mechanism for frequently accessed metadata - Memory usage optimization - Batch operations for better performance

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MetadataCache 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(options)](./koatty_container.metadatacache._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>MetadataCache</code> class |
